name: MEGAPARSEC
description:
A small space side-scrolling shooter game about fighting billions of bad guys somewhere in the Multiverse...

As this is just a demonstrational build, a lot of things does not work as they should. You may notice the art part of the game is quite unproportional and looks unfinished and thats the way it is.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
R - Restart
E - Bomb
Space, Ctrl, LMB - Fire
FULL GAMEPAD SUPPORT!

Purchase the original soundtrack:
http://moroseof.bandcamp.com/album/megaparsec-ost
